mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION

SELECT RS_NO,MEMBER_EMAIL,MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_TEL,RS_DATE,SERVICE_PRICE,SERVICE_ST FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY RS_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE SERVICE_ST ='N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -1), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')

SELECT SUM(SERVICE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SERVICE_PRICE FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE TRUNC(TO_DATE(RS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')
SELECT SUM(SERVICE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SERVICE_PRICE FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE RS_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) + 1

SELECT SUM(SERVICE_PRICE) AS TOTAL_SERVICE_PRICE FROM RESERVATION R JOIN SERVICE_TYPE USING(SERVICE_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE RS_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('2023-12-31 00:00:00', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
